snippet.title: THE GAME OF LIFE 2 Accolades Trailer - Coming Soon to Steam & Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
It’s almost time to live a new LIFE on PC. The official contemporary sequel to one of the world’s most popular board games is coming soon to Steam! With more choices and more freedom than ever before, there are a thousand new ways to live in THE GAME OF LIFE 2! 

This time there’s more to winning the game than just money. Gain points for Happiness, Knowledge and Wealth, and make your choices count.

It’s multiplayer fun on PC and mobile, with cross-platform gaming. So you can challenge friends and family to a game whether they’re on PC, iPhone or Android! Will you get married or stay single? Have a baby, or adopt a pet? Be a Video Blogger, or go to college and become a Robotics Engineer? The choice is yours!

THE GAME OF LIFE 2 coming soon to Steam. Add it to your wishlist today!

Marmalade Game Studio will also be bringing THE GAME OF LIFE 2 to Nintendo Switch consoles in 2021.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1455630/THE_GAME_OF_LIFE_2/

Find out more about THE GAME OF LIFE 2 game: 
Webpage: http://marmaladegamestudio.com/

Follow Marmalade Game Studio:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MarmaladeGameStudio/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarmaladeGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/marmaladegames/
